item.title: Hellscape 24/7?
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

joey...:

what? i got reported for what?? how do i bump? what are you talking about?? i didnt mean to do anything bad…im new at this. and how do i talk to the owner?

Reasons for report: 1)Useless poll. Unless it will help the community don’t post it, its wasting space!
2)Bumping, this is called bumping, or spamming. Don’t triple post or warning next time.

How do you bump: You do what you did here:
[center][quote=“joey…, post:3, topic:112896”]the ip is hellscape.myftp.biz[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 09:15:55 AM[/size][hr]nah the owner told me it was 24/7 too…[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 09:16:33 AM[/size][hr]do you know whats wrong with it?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 18, 2007, 09:17:18 AM[/size][hr]and im new at this fourms thing so could you tell me howi could messgae the owner of ther server on the fourms?[/quote][/center]

What am I talking about: I am trying to rid the community of people spaming and wasting precious time of the Moderation Team!

You didn’t mean to do anything bad: Well first of all, yyou should have read the rules of this forum section and of the overall forums!
Links:
[ul][li]Overall Forum Rules[/li]
[li]Moparscape Questions Sectional Rules and FAQ[/li][/ul]

How do I talk to the owner: Find out whoever posted the topic for the server. Look at the top-left hand conor of their post and see the thing that says rep= below it is a box that will either say offline or online. Click on the box and you will enter a private message box, where you can privately email him using the forums email. To check if he emailed you back later on go up to the top where it says “Home Help Search” and sofourth and click no the “My messages” From there you can check messages and send messages!

-Remember the rules,
Rich Dude99

Read full topic
